Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.validation

Interface IContentValidator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IResourceLoader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonSchemaContentValidator, XmlSchemaContentValidator
    public interface IContentValidator
extends IResourceLoader
    A common interface for Metaschema related content validators.
